name: generator-ng2-vscode-template
description: Yeoman Generator for Visual Studio Code setting up a basic Angular 2.0 project structure with Gulp task runner, Jasmine unit tests and third party library (D3) integration.
readme: Yeoman Generator for Visual Studio Code setting up a basic Angular 2.0 project structure with Gulp task runner, Jasmine unit tests and third party library (D3) integration.
